title: Why Remove Zephyr???
body:

Even if it wasn't bought as half as much as say, a game that Literally EVERY adc has to buy {{item:3031}}  {{item:3031}}  {{item:3031}}  {{item:3031}}  {{item:3031}}  It still had it's niche

I agree.  I don't even understand why there are items at all.

Why not have a "manual calibration" option, so that instead of buying items, you simply buy AP/AD/CD/MR/AR according to the base gold value that each skill is worth.  

If the items themselves are mispriced (overvalued), then this is an advantage to buy an item, but there should still be an option to just increase the skill level per the amount that your current gold can buy.

Thoughts?

Thanks.

No one ever used it except for Trick2G and his bandwagon of wannabes. Not saying Trick ain't good, he's a god amongst men that's for sure, but he was one person using one item that served no other purpose.
